name: Radioactive (itch) (toadwashington)
description:
Radioactive

Cube City is in grave danger, and you're the only one who can help them! Venture into the depths of a nuclear factory and shut it down before the whole city gets destroyed!

Use wasd or arrow keys to move.

Get to the green platform to reach the end of the level.

Obtain collectibles along the way for an extra challenge!

Press t to go through doors.

CHEATS:

Press p to skip a level.

Press F3 to enter fly mode.

There are three levels. Good luck!
